message.content:
1. Nasal insufflation of CO2 has been studied in animal pain models.
2. Nasal insufflation of CO2 has shown to exert antinociceptive effects in these models.
3. Nasal insufflation of CO2 has shown to exert antihyperalgesic effects in these models.
4. The animal pain models used topical capsaicin.
5. The effects of CO2 insufflation were observed with the activation of TRPV1-receptor positive nociceptive neurons.

messages.content:
Statement: Nasal insufflation of CO2 has been shown to exert antinociceptive respectively antihyperalgesic effects in animal pain models using topical capsaicin with activation of TRPV1-receptor positive nociceptive neurons.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
